resources.string: Help us stop the spread of COVID-19
Enable the Ontario Ministry of Health contact you directly if you have been in close contact with a case of COVID-19.
Help us stop the spread of COVID-19
Enable the Ontario Ministry of Health to contact you directly if you have been in close contact with a case of COVID-19.
Enter your mobile number to be contacted

The Ontario Ministry of Health will use this information only to contact you if it is needed for contact tracing.\n\n We will also send you a One-Time Pin (OTP) to confirm that this number belongs to you, and it is correct.
You received a text message through the number provided in the previous step. Please check it, and enter the OTP.
Get Started: Turn on your Bluetooth

Join us against COVID-19 to help protect yourself and your community!

 Your Bluetooth signal will identify if you are near another user of the app. This proximity data is encrypted and stored only on your phone.

 When you ensure Bluetooth is on every time you leave your house, you help keep track of the spread of COVID-19.

 For more information, see our FAQ.
Permissions already enabled, click OK to start contact tracing.
Share when app is running in the background
Keep Bluetooth on to help stop COVID-19. Continue sharing in the background to improve tracking effectiveness!
Share this app with family and friends.
Contact tracing is more effective when more people are using the app.
If you test positive, then tap to learn how to share your contacts. For more info, see our FAQ.
You are participating in contact tracing
Fight against COVID-19 and keep Bluetooth on
When you keep Bluetooth on, you protect you, your loved ones and the community from getting infected. Contact tracing only works when more people use the app.
Protect you and your community, and stop the infection by turning on Bluetooth.
Protect you and your community, and stop the infeectiion by turning on Bluetooth
Error completing device registration using this number
Error confirming device registration with OTP entered
You have not allowed permission to connect.
When you allow permission to connect to the app, you help contact tracing to do its job to slow down the spread of COVID-19 and prevent further infections.
Coarse Location permission needed for Bluetooth Low Energy to work. Allowing access enables the discovery of other devices. This proximity data is encrypted and stored only on your phone.
